Spells:
Blink (Bloodline Starsoul3 Tran): Self becomes ethereal randomly (half damage from area attacks and falling, foes have 50% miss chance) for 20 rd
Call Lightning Storm (Bloodline Starsoul5 Evoc): R1200' 1 bolt/rd inflicts 5d6 HP (DC 18 Ref half) for 20 min or 15 bolts
Glitterdust (Bloodline Starsoul2 Conj): R300' Creatures in 10' radius outlined and blind for 20 rd (DC 15 Will outlined only)
Greater Prying Eyes (Bloodline Starsoul8 Divi): 1d4+20 floating eyes (AC 18, 1 HP, +16 Stealth, +20 Perception, Fly 30') with True Seeing scout 1 mile for 20 hr
Meteor Swarm (Bloodline Starsoul9 Evoc): R1200' 4 spheres inflict 6d6 HP fire in 40' radius (DC 22 Ref half), ranged touch +2d6 HP bludgeoning
Overland Flight (Bloodline Starsoul5 Tran): Self gains 40' fly speed and +10 Fly skill for 20 hr
Repulsion (Bloodline Starsoul7 Abju): Creatures stay 200' away (DC 20 Will neg) for 20 rd
Reverse Gravity (Bloodline Starsoul7 Tran): R300' Objects in 20 10' cu fall upward for 20 rd
Unseen Servant (Bloodline Starsoul1 Conj): R75' Invisible servant obeys self for 20 hr
Wall Of Fire (Aurora Borealis4 Evoc): R300' 400' wall inflicts 2d4 HP to creatures w/in 10', 1d4 HP to creatures w/in 20', 2d6+20 HP when passing through (undead dbl) for conc + 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Aurora Borealis: May use modified Wall Of Fire effects that inflict cold damage and fascinate 40 HD of creatures w/in 10' (DC 23 Will neg) for 20 rd/dy
Bloodline Starsoul: Evocation spells inflict dazzled for 1 rd/spell level
Breaching The Gulf: +3 caster level on teleportation spells/R30' May teleport target to void, inflicting 6d6 HP cold/rd and suffocation (DC 23 Will neg or ends) 1/dy
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Minute Meteors: R30' 5' diameter inflicts 1d4+10 HP fire (DC 23 Ref neg) 6/dy
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
